title: [Help] USB Boot file Iso Norton Bootable Recovery Tool

forumNotes.author: Joeye
forumNotes.content:
Hi all,  

I use **MultiBootISOs-2.1.2.6.exe**   

add code menu.list:  

> find --set-root /NBRT.ISO  
> map /NBRT.ISO (0xff)  
> map --hook  
> root (0xff)  
> chainloader (0xff)

===\>Not run. ![:cheers:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/cheers.gif)(  

Help me edit menu.list to boot file NBRT.ISO from USB (Norton Bootable Recovery Tool)  

Thank you all,  

PS: I'm from VietNam, english very bad. ![:D](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/biggrin.png)  

E-mail: Mr.TuanAnh37@gmail.com   

**Edited by bugnotme, 18 October 2010 - 05:42 AM.**
